author: Marina Pitofsky
title: WHO: No indication coronavirus was constructed in lab
description: The World Health Organization (WHO) said Tuesday that current evidence points to the novel coronavirus originating in bats in China late last year, adding that it  was likely not made in a lab or elsewhere."All ava...
content:
The World Health Organization (WHO) said Tuesday that current evidence points to the novel coronavirus originating in bats in China late last year, adding that it  was likely not made in a lab or elsewhere.
All available evidence suggests the virus has an an… [+1705 chars]
